title: Serious problems with Thunderbird new veeersion
content:
Serious new problems with Thunderbird Thunderbird recently changed, and while II noticed no improvements, three serious problems were introduced which will force me to abandon Thunderbird if not resolved: 1. I cannot see attachments in some emails, apparently those with multiple recipients. The attachment’s links are simply not visible.

2. The ability to adjust message magnification/font size with Conntrol “+” and “-“ has disappeared. I have to copy message contents into Word now to enlarge enough to read.


3. Messages I do not want to see (at that time) are opened uncontrollably, sometimes in large numbers. Apparently related to multiple recipients on a thread. I am wasting a lot of time closing maybe dozens of unwanted messages.
